intro: Lebretonia cernua, commonly known as the drooping lebretonia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to South Africa and is characterized by its slender, trailing stems and small, pale yellow flowers. Lebretonia cernua is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique foliage and delicate blooms.
